definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Da4 Bai3 ke1 Quan2 shu1 Chu1 ban3 she4
containing_words.word: 中國大百科全書出版社

sentences.english: The encyclopedia thudded onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 那本百科全書砰地掉在地板上。

sentences.english: "I could look in the encyclopedia, " she said to herself.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去查百科全書，”姍姍自言自語道。
一個在線協作的百科全書。

sentences.english: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 他們仍在孜孜不倦地編寫那部百科全書。

sentences.english: An encyclopedia embraces a great number of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 一部百科全書包含許多學科。
我們買了一套多媒體百科全書。

sentences.english: We tabbed him as a walking encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 我們管他叫活百科全書。

sentences.english: See also the Muggle Encyclopedia entry for the Wye River.
sentences.chinese: 參見《麻瓜百科全書》裏關於瓦伊河的詞條。

sentences.english: You will find the explanation in the encyclopedia .
sentences.chinese: 你可以在百科全書中找到解釋。

sentences.english: I'll look it up in the encyclopaedia .
sentences.chinese: 我將在百科全書中查閱它。

sentences.english: They are, in essence, the database owners of these encyclopedias.
sentences.chinese: 他們在本質上是這些百科全書的數據庫所有者。

sentences.english: The encyclopedia has been published in parts.
sentences.chinese: 這套百科全書已分冊出版。

sentences.english: I have looked it up in the encyclopedia.
sentences.chinese: 我已經在百科全書中查到它了。

sentences.english: When I was a kid, we had the World Book Encyclopedia on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 我還小時，書架上就擺着《世界百科全書》了。

sentences.english: A good encyclopaedia is a mine of information.
sentences.chinese: 一部好的百科全書是知識寶庫。

sentences.english: It's all part of the process of building a free encyclopedia-the largest encyclopedia in human history.
sentences.chinese: 史上最大免費百科全書就是這樣誕生的。

definition: dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
